gw.datatype.handler

Interface IDataTypePresentationHandler

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IDatePresentationHandler, IStringPresentationHandler

    public interface IDataTypePresentationHandler
    Handler for presentation aspects of a datatype.
    Author:
    pdalbora

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getDisplayFormat(java.lang.Object ctx, IPropertyInfo property)
      Gets the display format for the given owning object and numeric property.
      IPresentationHandler getGosuPresentationHandler(java.lang.Object ctx, IPropertyInfo property)

    • Method Detail

      • getDisplayFormat

        java.lang.String getDisplayFormat(java.lang.Object ctx,
                                  IPropertyInfo property)
        Gets the display format for the given owning object and numeric property. If the property is a Number, the format will be formatted according to DecimalFormat, otherwise, the prefix and postfix are extracted from the format so the format should be provided as [prefix]#[postfix] and the property will be formatted as : [prefix][value][postfix].
        Parameters:
        ctx - the object that owns the property. May be null.
        property - the property. May be null.
        Returns:
        the format, which must be a format supported by DecimalFormat.

      • getGosuPresentationHandler

        IPresentationHandler getGosuPresentationHandler(java.lang.Object ctx,
                                                IPropertyInfo property)

      • getPresentationType

        PresentationType getPresentationType(java.lang.Object ctx,
                                     IPropertyInfo property)
